General.Name: 1000mercis SA
General.Description: 1000mercis provides marketing solutions for companies in France and internationally. It offers CRM and data services, such as CRM strategy and lifecycles, CRM campaign management, acquisition and engagement programs, and loyalty programs; digital media services; and consulting services. The company also operates the Numberly Martech platform that provides email, SMS, push notifications, programmatic display, and social media services; messaging platform; and customer data platform that allows to collect customers data. The company serves banks and financial services, FMCG, luxury, health, and retails industries. 1000mercis was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Paris, France.
